name: Verbatim
author: Ramsay Lanier and Maxim Leyzerovich of nclud Labs

sections.description:
Verbatim gives readers the ability to highlight any text content on your page and generate and share a link to that content. When other users click the link, the page will scroll to the content and highlight the selected link. Verbatim also allows direct tweeting of the link for instant sharing of content!

Verbatim was developed by nclud, in Washington, D.C.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload verbatim-wordpress.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Adjust user settings in the ‘Settings’ menu
